content: आक्षिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [अक्षेण दीव्यति जयति जितं वा; अक्ष-ठक् <ls>P. IV. 4. 2</ls>] {@--1@} One who plays at dice. {@--2@} One who uses loaded dice ( भारभूतानक्षानाहरति वहति). {@--3@} One who gains by gambling. {@--4@} Won by gambling. {@--5@} Relating to dice or gambling; आक्षिकं ऋणं <ls>Ms. 8. 159</ls> incurred in gambling. --कः <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (= अक्षिक <ab>q. v.</ab>). --कं {@--1@} Money gained by gambling. {@--2@} Gambling debt, money lost at play.
